markdown: WORKING GROUP I Materials, Methods, and Evaluation in Cancer Nutrition Education Programs Objectives: 1. How do educational requirements in the nutritional aspects of cancer differ at different education levels? 2. How can the existing curricula in nutrition education undergraduate or graduate levels be made relevant to cancer? 3. How can audiovisual media contribute to cancer nutrition education, and at which levels? Who should develop audiovisual media? 4. What other educational techniques have been used or could be adapted to cancer nutrition education and at what levels? 5. How can the effectiveness of cancer nutrition education programs be evaluated? **Chairperson:** Robert Olson **Reporter:** Philip White **Participants:** Tom Almy Tom Almy George Blackburn Harry Broquist Sam Brown Doris Calloway Jack Filer Clifford Gastineau Joyce Margie Eleanor Montagu Art Schmale ~~David Shottenfeld~~ John Berg Charles Tashima
